"The Treasure Shop<pict StarGem>":
"The Treasure Shop is a place where you can spend SG on a variety of items.

Its lineup includes items that are useful for your adventure, but also some rarer products. There is a limit to the number of each item you can purchase at any one time.

In addition, some products can only be purchased while you have an active Premium Set."

"The product lineup is automatically updated once per day, but if you want to see other products right away, you can update it manually.

Manual updates are subject to the following limits:

・One free update per day
・One additional free update per day if you have an active Premium Set
・Three additional updates per day, each of which costs Star Gems"
